text: DC Rebirth is a massive DC Universe initiative published in 2016. == History == The event follows the ending of The New 52, a publishing era that rebooted DC Comics continuity in 2011 after the Flashpoint crossover. Its name is taken from the earlier series' Green Lantern: Rebirth and The Flash: Rebirth, both written by Geoff Johns and focusing on returning their characters to an earlier status quo while updating the premises for new audiences. The initiative is intended to synchronize and harmonize the Post-Flashpoint continuity and the Post-Crisis continuity. == Issues == === One-Shots === * Aquaman: Rebirth #1 (August, 2016) * Batgirl and
